name: craftykoko
description: this is to create a mock web app using demo structure

scripts.start: cross-env TEMP=G:\craftykoko\.tmp TMPDIR=G:\craftykoko\.tmp parcel index.html && parcel watch index.html
scripts.build: cross-env TEMP=G:\craftykoko\.tmp TMPDIR=G:\craftykoko\.tmp parcel build index.html

author: Sohom Das
